愼字的基本解释

愼
shèn
同“慎”。

愼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shèn］
［《廣韻》時刃切，去震，禪。］
“愼1”的新字形。“昚1”的今字。“眘1”的今字。
(1)谨慎；慎重。
(2)指实在或真诚。
(3)恐惧；忧惧。
(4)千万，无论如何。与“無”、“毋”、“勿”等连用，表示警戒。
(5)遵循；依顺。
(6)三的别称。
(7)五岁的兽。
(8)谓用大绳引棺就殡所。
(9)姓。战国有慎到。见《通志·氏族五》引汉应劭《风俗通》。
[②]［zhèn］
［《集韻》之刃切，去震，章。］
亦作“愼2”。
古地名。在今安徽省颖上县北江口集。

愼字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　愼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页396第47
〔古文〕?眘㥲昚【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?時刃切，蜃去聲。【說文】謹也。【書·益稷】愼乃在位。【正義】當謹愼汝所在之位也。　又誠也。【詩·小雅】愼爾言也。【又】愼爾優游。【箋】皆曰誠也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】靜也。【疏】愼者，謹靜也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】思也。【疏】《方言》云：秦晉曰愼。凡思之貌皆曰愼。　又禁戒詞。【史記·吳王濞傳】上謂濞曰：愼無反。　又司愼，天神名。【左傳·襄十一年】司愼，司盟。【註】二司，天神名。　又姓，韓大夫愼到。又公愼，複姓。　又【集韻】之刃切，音震。【前漢·地理志】汝南郡愼陽。【如淳曰】音震。【闞駰曰】本作滇。永平五年失印更刻，遂以水爲心。　又【集韻】丞眞切，音辰。【周禮·夏官·大司馬註】獸五歲爲愼。　【六書精薀】人心有假者，修之於昭昭，肆之於冥冥，惟愼爲眞心。【徐鍇曰】眞心爲愼，不鹵莽也。

愼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
愼字的起名意思

同“慎”。

Stupefied
Basic explanation of words
Stupefied
shèn
Same as "Shen".
Stupefied
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shèn］
["Guangyun" is cutting, deviating, and Zen. ]
The new glyph of "愼1". The present word for "Zhang 1". The present word for "Shen 1".
(1) Be cautious; be cautious.
(2) Refers to real or sincere.
(3) Fear; fear.
(4) Ten million, anyway. Used with "none", "wu", "don't", etc., to indicate caution.
(5) Follow; follow.
(6) Another name for three.
(7) Five-year-old beast.
(8) It is said that the funeral home is used to draw the coffin with a big rope.
(9) Last name. Be cautious in the warring states. See "Tong Zhi · Clan Five" cited Han Ying Shao's "Fun Su Tong".
[②]［zhèn］
[The cutting edge of "Ji Yun", to shake, chapter. ]
Also known as "愼2".
Ancient place names. In today's Beijiangkou, Yingshang County, Anhui Province.
Stupefied
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　愼; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 396-47
〔古文〕? Shen 㥲 昚【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? When the blade cuts, the mirage is gone. [Said Wen] Sincerely too. 【Book·Yiji】Xun is in power. [Justice] When you are in awe.　You are sincere. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Yan Eryan also. [Also] Min Youyou. 【Jian】Jie Yue is sincere.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Jing Ye. 【Sparse】Those who are stunned, keep quiet.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Thinking too. [Shu] "Dialect" says: Qin Jin said dazed. The appearance of all thinking is said to be stunned.　Also forbidden words. [Historical Records·The Biography of Wu Wangbi] The above said Bi said: Suddenly.　Simeng again, the name of the god. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Year of Xiang] Si Yun, Si Meng. [Note] Second Division, the name of the deity.　The last name is again, Dr. Han stunned. He was stunned again, and his surname was restored.　[Jiyun] The blade cut again, the sound vibrates. [Former Han Geography] Yunyang, Runan County. [Ru Chun said] The sound is trembling. [Kan Qi said] This is Dian. In the five years of Yong Ping, he lost his seal even more, so he took water as his heart.　[Jiyun] Cheng Luqie, Yinchen. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Da Sima Note】The beast is five years old as stunned.　【Six Books Jingxu】Those who have false minds, cultivate them in Zhaozhao, want to be in the dark, but stunned are dignified. [Xu Kai said] The heart is stunned, not rash.
